entry.source: Have you ever heard of {F804,5}{F872,1}?{F804,0} It's one{F801}of the divine wines created by the {F804,5}Zealot{F801}Dionysus.{F804,0} Supposedly, if you drink it while{F801}you're drunk, your strength increases tenfold.{F801}Plus, it only works on women. Dionysus was{F801}seen in downtown Ginza. Can you get me some?{F801}
